mapper.insert: insert into t_car (id, car_num, brand, guide_price, produce_time, car_type) values (null, #{carNum}, #{brand}, #{guidePrice}, #{produceTime}, #{carType})
mapper.update: update t_car set car_num = #{carNum}, brand = #{brand}, guide_price = #{guidePrice}, produce_time = #{produceTime}, car_type = #{carType} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, car_num carNum, brand, guide_price guidePrice, produce_time produceTime, car_type carType from t_car;
